I have the following T206 cards available all with the tough Hindu back.  Pictures and prices are below.  The prices are for PayPal FF (Please add 3% for PayPal goods), and does include delivery.  If interested, please send a PM or an email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].

Hickman SGC 20 - $285 *SOLD*
Hooker SGC 10 - $205 *SOLD*
Howard SGC 10 - $185 *SOLD*
Lipe Poor - $162
Kling SGC 20 - $335 *SOLD*

Thanks,

Tom
